snippet: Having shaped the issue in terms of a humanitarian crisis, President Obama made it clear that the United States won’t ignore the growing catastrophe.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Pres Obama's announcement that the United States will drop food and water supplies for some 40,000 Iraqis near Turkish border and that he has authorized airstrikes against Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, if needed; calls on US, Turkey and other allies to move quickly to meet Kurds' needs for ammunition and weapons.
lead_paragraph: Having shaped the issue in terms of a humanitarian crisis, President Obama made it clear that the United States won’t ignore the growing catastrophe.
